languages.text: "Шесть слуг Омниссии, составлявших его, сокрыли свою память от самих себя, прикрыли ее фальшивыми личностями и были разосланы по разным точкам Простора Коронус. Они спрятались. Каждый из них должен был прожить много десятилетий в одиночестве и накопить опыт индивидуальных наблюдений перед тем, как Амарнат вновь воссоединится для повторного решения дилеммы. Реставрации".

"The six constituent servants of the Omnissiah hid their own memories from themselves behind false personas and were sent off to various parts of the Koronus Expanse. They went into hiding. Each had to live in solitude for many decades, accumulating individual observations before eventually bringing that experience back to a reunited Amarnat, who would then tackle the dilemma once more. That would be the Restoration."
languages.original_text: "Шесть слуг Омниссии, составлявших его, сокрыли свою память от самих себя, прикрыли ее фальшивыми личностями и были разосланы по разным точкам Простора Коронус. Они спрятались. Каждый из них должен был прожить много десятилетий в одиночестве и накопить опыт индивидуальных наблюдений перед тем, как Амарнат вновь воссоединится для повторного решения дилеммы. Реставрации".

languages.text: 「万機神の七大構成従者は自身の記憶を偽りのペルソナの背後に隠し、コロヌス・エクスパンスのさまざまな地域に送り出された。姿をくらませたのだ。何十年という歳月を孤独に過ごし、所見を蓄積する必要があった。最終的に、その経験をアマルナトに統合して再びジレンマの解消に取り組む算段だったというわけだ。それこそが復元となる」
languages.original_text: "The seven constituent servants of the Omnissiah hid their own memories from themselves behind false personas and were sent off to various parts of the Koronus Expanse. They went into hiding. Each had to live in solitude for many decades, accumulating observations and eventually bringing that experience to a reunited Amarnat who would tackle the dilemma once more. That would be the Restoration."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神の七大構成従者は自身の記憶を偽りのペルソナの背後に隠し、コロヌス・エクスパンスのさまざまな地域に送り出された。姿をくらませたのだ。何十年という歳月を孤独に過ごし、所見を蓄積する必要があった。最終的に、その経験をアマルナトに統合して再びジレンマの解消に取り組む算段だったというわけだ。それこそが復元となる」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “欧姆尼塞亚的六位仆人，也就是聚合意识的六个分支，将自己的记忆藏在虚假的身份之后，被派往科罗努斯扩区的各个地方，躲藏起来。他们每个人都必须孤身生活数十年，积累各自的观察数据，最终将获得的经验带给重聚的阿玛纳特，而他将再度审视那个困境。这就是所谓的‘复原’。”
languages.original_text: "The six constituent servants of the Omnissiah hid their own memories from themselves behind false personas and were sent off to various parts of the Koronus Expanse. They went into hiding. Each had to live in solitude for many decades, accumulating individual observations before eventually bringing that experience back to a reunited Amarnat, who would then tackle the dilemma once more. That would be the Restoration."

traits.locale_text: “欧姆尼塞亚的六位仆人，也就是聚合意识的六个分支，将自己的记忆藏在虚假的身份之后，被派往科罗努斯扩区的各个地方，躲藏起来。他们每个人都必须孤身生活数十年，积累各自的观察数据，最终将获得的经验带给重聚的阿玛纳特，而他将再度审视那个困境。这就是所谓的‘复原’。”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Les six serviteurs de l'Omnimessie ont alors scellé leurs propres souvenirs et se sont inventé de nouvelles identités avant d'être dispersés aux quatre coins des Étendues de Koronus. Ils ont vécu dans la solitude des décennies durant, observant tout ce qui pouvait l'être afin de pouvoir ensuite chacun faire part de leur expérience à un Amarnat rétabli, qui pourrait alors se repencher sur le dilemme. Voilà ce qu'est la Restauration. »
languages.original_text: "The six constituent servants of the Omnissiah hid their own memories from themselves behind false personas and were sent off to various parts of the Koronus Expanse. They went into hiding. Each had to live in solitude for many decades, accumulating individual observations before eventually bringing that experience back to a reunited Amarnat, who would then tackle the dilemma once more. That would be the Restoration."

traits.locale_text: « Les six serviteurs de l'Omnimessie ont alors scellé leurs propres souvenirs et se sont inventé de nouvelles identités avant d'être dispersés aux quatre coins des Étendues de Koronus. Ils ont vécu dans la solitude des décennies durant, observant tout ce qui pouvait l'être afin de pouvoir ensuite chacun faire part de leur expérience à un Amarnat rétabli, qui pourrait alors se repencher sur le dilemme. Voilà ce qu'est la Restauration. »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «Los seis sirvientes que formaban el Omnissiah ocultaron sus propios recuerdos de sí mismos inventando falsas personalidades y se les envió a diferentes zonas de la Extensión de Koronus. Se ocultaron. Tuvieron que aislarse durante décadas, recopilando observaciones individuales para luego crear un nuevo Amarnat en el que aplicarían lo aprendido y se enfrentarían al dilema una vez más».
languages.original_text: "The six constituent servants of the Omnissiah hid their own memories from themselves behind false personas and were sent off to various parts of the Koronus Expanse. They went into hiding. Each had to live in solitude for many decades, accumulating individual observations before eventually bringing that experience back to a reunited Amarnat, who would then tackle the dilemma once more. That would be the Restoration."

traits.locale_text: «Los seis sirvientes que formaban el Omnissiah ocultaron sus propios recuerdos de sí mismos inventando falsas personalidades y se les envió a diferentes zonas de la Extensión de Koronus. Se ocultaron. Tuvieron que aislarse durante décadas, recopilando observaciones individuales para luego crear un nuevo Amarnat en el que aplicarían lo aprendido y se enfrentarían al dilema una vez más».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Die sechs konstituiven Diener des Omnissiah verbargen ihre eigenen Erinnerungen hinter falschen Personas vor sich selbst und wurden in verschiedene Bereiche der Koronus-Ausdehnung geschickt. Sie haben sich versteckt. Jeder sollte viele Jahrzehnte lang in Einsamkeit leben, eigene Beobachtungen sammeln und diese Erfahrungen schließlich zu einem wiedervereinten Amarnat bringen, der das Dilemma erneut angehen sollte. Das sollte die Restauration sein."
languages.original_text: "The six constituent servants of the Omnissiah hid their own memories from themselves behind false personas and were sent off to various parts of the Koronus Expanse. They went into hiding. Each had to live in solitude for many decades, accumulating individual observations before eventually bringing that experience back to a reunited Amarnat, who would then tackle the dilemma once more. That would be the Restoration."

traits.locale_text: "Die sechs konstituiven Diener des Omnissiah verbargen ihre eigenen Erinnerungen hinter falschen Personas vor sich selbst und wurden in verschiedene Bereiche der Koronus-Ausdehnung geschickt. Das sollte die Restauration sein."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Hafızalarını sahte kişiliklerin ardına yerleştirip kendilerinden saklayan altı Hermesih hizmetkârı, Koronus Enginliği'nin farklı bölgelerine gönderildi. Kendilerini gizlediler. Her biri on yıllar boyunca izole bir yaşam sürmek durumunda kaldı. Bu sırada bireysel gözlemler yaptılar, ileride yeniden birleşip ikilemi bir kez daha çözmeye çalışacak Amarnat için deneyim topladılar. Yeniden Yapılanma, bu birleşme olayıdır."
languages.original_text: "The six constituent servants of the Omnissiah hid their own memories from themselves behind false personas and were sent off to various parts of the Koronus Expanse. They went into hiding. Each had to live in solitude for many decades, accumulating individual observations before eventually bringing that experience back to a reunited Amarnat, who would then tackle the dilemma once more. That would be the Restoration."

traits.locale_text: "Hafızalarını sahte kişiliklerin ardına yerleştirip kendilerinden saklayan altı Hermesih hizmetkârı, Koronus Enginliği'nin farklı bölgelerine gönderildi. Kendilerini gizlediler.
